mods.name: create-mod.jar
mods.description: Create is a mod that adds a variety of new mechanical components and systems to Minecraft, allowing players to build complex contraptions and machines.
mods.author: simibubi

mods.name: curios-api.jar
mods.description: Curios is a mod that introduces a new inventory system in Minecraft, allowing players to equip and manage various accessories and items in additional slots.
mods.author: TheIllusiveC4

mods.name: FarmersDelight.jar
mods.description: Farmer's Delight is a mod that enhances the farming and cooking experience in Minecraft by adding new crops, food items, and cooking mechanics.
mods.author: vectorwing

mods.name: jei-1.21.1.jar
mods.description: Just Enough Items (JEI) is a mod that provides an in-game recipe viewer and item list, making it easier for players to discover crafting recipes and item uses.
mods.author: mezz

mods.name: sophisticatedbackpacks-1.21.1.jar
mods.description: Sophisticated Backpacks is a mod that adds customizable backpacks to Minecraft, allowing players to carry more items and organize their inventory efficiently.
mods.author: P3pp3rF1y

mods.name: sophisticatedcore-1.21.1.jar
mods.description: Sophisticated Core is a mod that provides core functionalities and libraries for the Sophisticated Backpacks mod, ensuring smooth integration and performance.
mods.author: P3pp3rF1y

mods.name: XaerosWorldMap.jar
mods.description: Xaero's World Map is a mod that adds a detailed world map to Minecraft, helping players navigate and explore their surroundings more effectively.
mods.author: Xaero96
